00029 #ifndef ANALYSIS_H
00030 #define ANALYSIS_H
00031 
00032 #include "Circuit.h"
00033 #include "BMatrix.h"
00034 
00035 class Analysis
00036 {
00037 protected:
00038     bool simulation_done; // This is a variable to check if we already did the analysis
00039     
00040 public:
00041     Analysis(){};
00042     virtual ~Analysis(){};
00043     
00044     virtual void simulate(BMatrix::Sparse<double> &G, BMatrix::Sparse<double> &C, BMatrix::Dense<double> &B, Circuit* circ)=0;
00045 };
00046 
00047 
00049 class DC: public Analysis
00050 {
00051  
00052 private:  
00053     BMatrix::Dense<double> dc_solution; //the solution to the DC
00054 
00055 public:
00056     DC();
00057 
00058     ~DC(){};
00059     void simulate(BMatrix::Sparse<double> &G, BMatrix::Sparse<double> &C, BMatrix::Dense<double> &B, Circuit* circ);
00060      
00061      const BMatrix::Dense<double>& get_solution() { return dc_solution ; }
00062 };
00063 
00065 class transient: public Analysis
00066 {
00067  
00068 private:  
00069     BMatrix::Dense<double> tr_solution; //the solution to the DC
00070     double h; //the step size
00071     
00072     double start_time; //the starting time of the simulation_done
00073     double end_time; //the end time of the simulation
00074     
00075 public:
00076     transient(double _start_time, double _end_time , double _h):start_time(_start_time), end_time(_end_time), h(_h){};
00077 
00078     void simulate(BMatrix::Sparse<double> &G, BMatrix::Sparse<double> &C, BMatrix::Dense<double> &B, Circuit* circ);
00079     
00080 };
